etomica.data.meter

Class MeterBondOrderParameterQ

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.DataSourceScalar
      • etomica.data.meter.MeterBondOrderParameterQ
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource

    public class MeterBondOrderParameterQ
extends DataSourceScalar
    The Bond Order Parameter Ql provides a metric that indicates the crystallinity of a box. Appropriate for 3-dimensional system only. Refer: Journal of Chemical Physics Vol.104 No.24,22nd June,1996__ Rate of crystal nucleation

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class etomica.data.DataSourceScalar

    • Method Detail

      • getDataAsScalar

        public double getDataAsScalar()
        Returns the value of the bond-order parameter for the given box in its current configuration. Returned array has only one element.
        Specified by:
        getDataAsScalar in class DataSourceScalar

      • getL

        public int getL()

      • setL

        public void setL(int L)
        Sets the value of the parameter l, to indicate if Q4 or Q6 is to be computed. Input of any value other than 4 causes L to be set to 6.

      • setIterator

        public void setIterator(AtomsetIteratorBoxDependent iter)
        Sets the iterator that gives the atoms over which the order parameter will be calculated. Default iterator is ApiLeafAtoms.
        Parameters:
        iter -
